name: v0.2.5
body:
## `WORKSPACE` code
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_cuda",
    sha256 = "fe8d3d8ed52b9b433f89021b03e3c428a82e10ed90c72808cc4988d1f4b9d1b3",
    strip_prefix = "rules_cuda-v0.2.5",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/releases/download/v0.2.5/rules_cuda-v0.2.5.tar.gz"],

rules_cuda_dependencies()

```

name: v0.2.4
body:
## What's Changed
* fix(bcr): add basic presubmit yaml by @wep21 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/273
* style: new version of buildifier will automatically sort load on format, trigger formatting in one pass by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/275
* replace accesses to cc_toolchain.compiler_executable with calls to cc_toolchain.get_tool_for_action() by @hypdeb in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/274
* Add NVRTC to local_cuda by @Vertexwahn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/289
* ci: fix ci due to breaking change in bazel 8 by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/297
* chore: update docs to include v0.2.3 by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/298
* refactor: split monolithic BUILD.local_cuda into template fragments by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/284
* fix: add `:compiler_deps` to `cuda_toolchain` by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/301
* feat: add nvjitlink by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/305
* ci: make chatty by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/306
* fix: add culibos to cuda_runtime by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/302
* feat: add nvjpeg by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/304
* feat: add static version cufft (for device callback) by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/303
* feat: add compiler_label attr to cuda_toolchain for in repo compiler executable by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/309
* fix: add rdc filter to cuda_binary by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/310
* feat: add nppi that groups all nppi_* sub-targets with uber header by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/311
* Make stardoc in sync with WORKSPACE usage by @udaya2899 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/312
* fix; Allow cuda_test to specify the `data` attribute. by @bgianfo in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/314
* test(refactor): make label of rules_cuda repo targets special handling explicit by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/321
* feat: make sysroot a feature by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/315
* fix(nvcc): append to `cpp_compile` `PATH` by @lukasoyen in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/323
* fix(ci): fix ci pipelines prior updating dependency bazel to v8 by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/320

## New Contributors
* @wep21 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/273
* @hypdeb made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/274
* @udaya2899 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/312
* @bgianfo made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/314
* @lukasoyen made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/323

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/compare/v0.2.3...v0.2.4

name: v0.2.3
body:
## `WORKSPACE` code
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_cuda",
    sha256 = "c92b334d769a07cd991b7675b2f6076b8b95cd3b28b14268a2f379f8baae58e0",
    strip_prefix = "rules_cuda-v0.2.3",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/releases/download/v0.2.3/rules_cuda-v0.2.3.tar.gz"],
)

load("@rules_cuda//cuda:repositories.bzl", "register_detected_cuda_toolchains", "rules_cuda_dependencies")
rules_cuda_dependencies()
register_detected_cuda_toolchains()
```

## What's Changed
* Make it clear that "integrity" field expects SRI by @zifeitong in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/259
* Fix strip_prefix when publishing to BCR by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/269

## New Contributors
* @zifeitong made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/259

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/compare/v0.2.2...v0.2.3

name: v0.2.2
body:
## `WORKSPACE` code
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_cuda",
    sha256 = "b066750579f33e93e9dc55b8ee2067b525d863c1ddcf09b47a6332c39f0701fb",
    strip_prefix = "rules_cuda-v0.2.2",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/releases/download/v0.2.2/rules_cuda-v0.2.2.tar.gz"],
)

load("@rules_cuda//cuda:repositories.bzl", "register_detected_cuda_toolchains", "rules_cuda_dependencies")
rules_cuda_dependencies()
register_detected_cuda_toolchains()
```

## What's Changed
* Filter attrs properly for cuda_test by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/180
* Fix cuda_test by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/181
* Add v0.2.1 to docs by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/184
* Pass through `--sysroot` to host compiler by @lalten in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/185
* Add cuda_binary macro by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/186
* Move non glob files out of glob by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/192
* Disallow autoupdate nccl by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/193
* eliminate cpu architecture constraint for clang by @dmellosanjay in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/208
* Check nvcc version before adding `--dopt on` flags by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/212
* Add alwayslink to cuda_binary and cuda_test macros by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/210
* Add additional tests for LTS releases by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/215
* Fix cquery-ing with cuda targets by @mvukov in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/209
* Propose new solution for know issue (nvcc filesystem race condition) by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/216
* Fix a typo in `if_cuda` doc by @rygx in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/222
* Ignore MODULE.bazel.lock file by @rygx in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/224
* ci: avoid nvcc /tmp race condition by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/232
* ci: disable doc test workflow cache to avoid excessive space wasting by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/231
* feat: Add features for compiling with -arch=all or -arch=all-major by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/245
* Fix spelling by @Vertexwahn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/250
* Change example rules_cuda version by @Vertexwahn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/249
* Document how to use rules_cuda with Bzlmod by @Vertexwahn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/252
* Do not assume libcupti.so location by @tyb0807 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/253
* ci: use absolute path for XDG_CACHE_HOME as github actions and bazel doesn't resolve `~` automatically by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/260
* ci: cover major bazel releases in utilities tests by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/262
* test: workaround label resolving with bzlmod by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/263
* fix(bzlmod): allow both root module and our module to call cuda.local_toolchain by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/264

## New Contributors
* @dmellosanjay made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/208
* @mvukov made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/209
* @rygx made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/222
* @Vertexwahn made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/250
* @tyb0807 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/253

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/compare/v0.2.1...v0.2.2

name: v0.2.1
body:
## `WORKSPACE` code
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

    name = "rules_cuda",
    sha256 = "2f8c8c8c85f727bec4423efecec12d3b751cb0a98bda99f0f9d351608a23b858",

    urls = ["https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/releases/download/v0.2.1/rules_cuda-v0.2.1.tar.gz"],
)

load("@rules_cuda//cuda:repositories.bzl", "register_detected_cuda_toolchains", "rules_cuda_dependencies")
rules_cuda_dependencies()
register_detected_cuda_toolchains()
```

## What's Changed
* Fix url for BCR publish app by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/165
* Add cuda_test rule by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/168
* chore(deps): update nccl digest to 4365458 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/171
* chore(deps): update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.4.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/173
* chore(deps): update actions/checkout action to v4 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/174
* chore(deps): update nccl-tests digest to 6c46206 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/172
* Fix cuda test duplicate deps attribute by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/176
* Improve RDC by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/167

## New Contributors
* @hofbi made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/168

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/compare/v0.2.0...v0.2.1

name: v0.2.0
body:
## `WORKSPACE` code
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_cuda",
    sha256 = "1efa8c3e514d8a770a27c7ed968a26ed8ee967ec7d471858da270ab03046a6b4",
    strip_prefix = "rules_cuda-v0.2.0",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/releases/download/v0.2.0/rules_cuda-v0.2.0.tar.gz"],
)

load("@rules_cuda//cuda:repositories.bzl", "register_detected_cuda_toolchains", "rules_cuda_dependencies")
rules_cuda_dependencies()
register_detected_cuda_toolchains()
```

## What's Changed
* Add host compiler flag to device link step by @jordancharest in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/65
* Use merge_cc_infos to calculate common flags by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/60
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v6.1.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/68
* chore(deps): update jimver/cuda-toolkit action to v0.2.9 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/69
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v6.1.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/70
* chore(deps): update jimver/cuda-toolkit action to v0.2.10 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/71
* Add ci docs gen and github pages pub by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/73
* Change building test combination by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/75
* Various fixes to get rules_cuda to work with Lambda-stack by @EthanSteinberg in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/74
* Decorate docs by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/76
* chore(deps): update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.1.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/77
* Stop using ubuntu-18.04 by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/80
* Relax the _check_opts impl by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/79
* chore(deps): update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.1.5 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/82
* chore(deps): update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.1.6 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/83
* Allow //cuda:copts to be repeatable by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/85
* Fix local docs build hint by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/87
* Allow multiple 'local' installs of cuda to be specified by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/66
* Fix possibly conflict artifact names by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/81
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v6.1.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/89
* chore(deps): update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.1.7 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/90
* chore(deps): update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.1.8 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/91
* chore(deps): update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.1.9 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/92
* Overhaul the URLs to the update new repo by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/93
* chore(deps): update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.1.11 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/94
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v6.2.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/95
* chore(deps): update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.1.12 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/96
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_stardoc to v0.5.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/98
* chore(deps): update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.1.13 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/97
* chore(deps): update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.1.14 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/100
* Slow the renovate  bot down by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/101
* chore(deps): update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.1.15 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/104
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_stardoc to v0.5.6 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/103
* Add NPP by @lalten in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/106
* Use windows-2019 for utilities tests by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/112
* add cuda_device_debug feature by @garymm in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/108
* Add support for missing archs by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/110
* chore(deps): update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.1.17 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/116
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v6.2.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/115
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.4.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/117
* Ignore MODULE.bazel for renovate bot by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/118
* Include versioned so files in cuda_runtime by @garymm in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/114
* support toolkit_path in rules_cuda_dependencies by @garymm in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/121
* apply some pre-commit fixes by @garymm in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/124
* run pre-commit in GitHub check by @garymm in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/122
* Format to fix precommit by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/126
* set nvcc --generate-line-info when compilation_mode=fastbuild by @garymm in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/120
* upgrade buildifier by @garymm in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/127
* have cuda_library output RDC by @garymm in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/125
* Fix obvious typo of templates by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/131
* Fix deps of rdc example by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/133
* chore(deps): update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.1.21 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/137
* chore(deps): update actions/cache action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/140
* chore(deps): update jimver/cuda-toolkit action to v0.2.11 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/138
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v6.3.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/139
* Add flag "--host_copts" to specify global host copts by @noaxp in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/141
* Fix _wrapper_device_link artifact name conflict by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/135
* Fix incorrect tools label for _wrapper_device_link by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/134
* The flags `-x c++` should be passed as `compile_flags`, instead of `host_compile_flags` by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/132
* Add basic CI testing for clang by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/143
* Fix default dbg and fastbuild optimization level for nvcc by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/129
* Add attr provides for cuda_library and cuda_objects by @Zeratul-Aiur in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/147
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v6.3.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/148
* Fix precommit by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/151
* Update stardoc to v0.6.2 manually by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/152
* chore(deps): update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.2.6 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/150
* Update bazel_skylib to 1.4.2 by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/155
* Factor out build env preparation by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/156
* Add nccl as an example by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/157
* Let cuda_objects expose transitive objects by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/154
* Add integration test CI pipeline by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/158
* allow .cpp and .cc files in srcs by @garymm in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/99
* Improve hermeticity for clang by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/159
* Update matrix versions by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/161

## New Contributors
* @jordancharest made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/65
* @EthanSteinberg made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/74
* @lalten made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/106
* @garymm made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/108
* @noaxp made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/141
* @Zeratul-Aiur made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/147

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/compare/v0.1.2...v0.2.0

name: v0.1.2
body:
## `WORKSPACE` code
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_cuda",
    sha256 = "dc1f4f704ca56e3d5edd973f98a45f0487d0f28c689d0a57ba236112148b1833",
    strip_prefix = "rules_cuda-v0.1.2",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/releases/download/v0.1.2/rules_cuda-v0.1.2.tar.gz"],
)

load("@rules_cuda//cuda:repositories.bzl", "register_detected_cuda_toolchains", "rules_cuda_dependencies")
rules_cuda_dependencies()
register_detected_cuda_toolchains()
```

## What's Changed
* chore(deps): update actions/upload-artifact action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/58
* Fix typos and grammar in README.md by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/61
* Add option to add files to the toolchain configuration by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/59
* Initial bzlmod support by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/36
* Allow inl as header suffix. by @liuliu in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/62
* Add publish-to-bcr configuration by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/64

## New Contributors
* @liuliu made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/62

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/compare/v0.1.1...v0.1.2

name: v0.1.1
body:
This release adds a new build artifact, `rules_cuda-vx.y.z.tar.gz`, for all future releases. This artifact is to be used by `http_archive`
repository rules. This also fixes the sha256 sum included in the sample `WORKSPACE` code.


## `WORKSPACE` code
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_cuda",
    sha256 = "b2750e65a2c0f34be643146b3975ded79b8c6edc47b529a5b774418139694032",
    strip_prefix = "rules_cuda-v0.1.1",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/releases/download/v0.1.1/rules_cuda-v0.1.1.tar.gz"],
)

load("@rules_cuda//cuda:repositories.bzl", "register_detected_cuda_toolchains", "rules_cuda_dependencies")
rules_cuda_dependencies()
register_detected_cuda_toolchains()
```

## What's Changed
* fix: generate release .tgz and correct checksum by @ryanleary in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/57


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/commits/v0.1.1

name: v0.1.0
body:
#rules_cuda Initial Release (v0.1.0)

This release adds support for builds using your local CUDA toolchain. It includes support for both `cuda_library` and `cuda_objects` rules (see `README.md` for more details). 

Please try the examples, migrate your builds to use these rules, and provide feedback!

## `WORKSPACE` code
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_cuda",
    sha256 = "c03654f2bb3d4b8573c99f0203e8e5f48a1db94c9a1719f04993dcb90b57bc7b",
    strip_prefix = "rules_cuda-0.1.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/archive/refs/tags/v0.1.0.tar.gz",
)

######################
# rules_bazel setup  #
######################
# Fetches the rules_bazel dependencies and initializes the cuda toolchain.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.

load("@rules_cuda//cuda:repositories.bzl", "register_detected_cuda_toolchains", "rules_cuda_dependencies")
rules_cuda_dependencies()
register_detected_cuda_toolchains()

```


## What's Changed
* eliminate cpu architecture constraint for nvcc by @ryanleary in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/8
* add support for some cudax libraries by @ryanleary in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/9
* add defensive wiring for header-only libraries by @ryanleary in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/11
* Fix typo by @ryanleary in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/10
* add agx orin & hopper compute capabilities by @ryanleary in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/12
* Add basic CI for utilities by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/13
* Add CI for building by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/14
* Add docs for various rule and macros by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/17
* Merge dlink_wrapper.bzl into dlink.bzl by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/18
* Add internal docstring by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/19
* Add bazelignore file by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/22
* Disable arch_native by default by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/21
* Silence deprecation warning by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/23
* chore: add pre-commit for buildifier/prettier by @ryanleary in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/24
* Add CODEOWNERS file by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/28
* Enable tests on pull requests by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/27
* refactor!: make structure consistent w/ rule guidelines by @ryanleary in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/25
* Use an older node version in pre-commit for compatibility with older … by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/29
* Move if_linux and if_windows into rules_cuda by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/30
* Build fix by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/33
* Fix flag_alias by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/34
* Set local and configure on local_cuda repository by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/37
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_stardoc to v0.5.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/41
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v5.3.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/42
* Make examples its own workspace by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/44
* ci: create release automation by @ryanleary in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/46
* Setup CI pipeline for testing docs generation by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/49
* Add features for relaxed-constexpr and extended-lambda by @jsharpe in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/48
* Make CI eco-friendly by avoiding run pipelines twice on push within PR by @cloudhan in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/50
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v5.4.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/52
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v6 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/53
* Enable rules_cuda by default, add docs by @ryanleary in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/54

## New Contributors
* @cloudhan made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/13
* @jsharpe made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/22
* @renovate made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/pull/41

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_cuda/commits/v0.1.0
